summary: This document is an email chain between CBS News reporter Matt Pieper and the Federal Bureau of Prisons Office of Public Affairs. Pieper is inquiring whether Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch while in custody. The BOP responds by providing a link to the Attorney General's statement on Epstein's death and declines further comment.
